title: Essentials: Hospital and Health Care Management
creator_credit: David Ryan, Education Resources Foundation and MTI Teleprograms
brief_description: This program seeks to provide a basis for improving the quality of first line hospital management by discussing what the role of the manager is and what skills such a person must have
